com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.CarrotAws

    • Uses of CarrotAws in com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.cfn

      Subclasses of CarrotAws in com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.cfn 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CarrotAwsCloudForm
      base for cloud formation goals
      class  CarrotAwsCloudFormCreate
      cloud formation: create stack based on: stack name, stack template (CarrotAwsCloudFormCreate.stackTemplateFile), stack parameters (CarrotAwsCloudFormCreate.stackPropertiesInputFile + CarrotAwsCloudFormCreate.stackInputParams), and produce a stack output (CarrotAwsCloudFormCreate.stackPropertiesOutputFile) as well as inject output into into project.properties ; wait for completion or fail (CarrotAwsCloudForm.stackTimeout);
      class  CarrotAwsCloudFormDelete
      cloud formation: delete stack based on: stack name; ; wait for completion or fail (CarrotAwsCloudForm.stackTimeout)
      class  CarrotAwsCloudFormUpdate
      cloud formation: update stack based on: stack name ; wait for completion or fail (CarrotAwsCloudForm.stackTimeout)

    • Uses of CarrotAws in com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.dns

      Subclasses of CarrotAws in com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.dns 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CarrotAwsNameServ 
      class  CarrotAwsNameServEnsureCNAME
      route53: ensure cname record
      class  CarrotAwsNameServFindZone
      route53: find dns zone name from dns host name
      class  CarrotAwsNameServListZone
      route53: list dns zone entires

    • Uses of CarrotAws in com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.ecc

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CarrotAwsElasComp 
      class  CarrotAwsElasCompImageReg
      register/create new ami image from existing AWS ElasticCompute instance
      class  CarrotAwsElasCompImageUnReg
      unregister/delete existing ami image

    • Uses of CarrotAws in com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.ssh

      class  CarrotAwsSecuShel 
      class  CarrotAwsSecuShelExecute
